name: Ki punch
description: Gather your ki in your fist and unleash it

name: Whirlwind kick
description: Ride the wind for a strong kick

name: Flame punch
description: Turn your ki into fire and focus it for a quick KO. Can inflict burns.

name: Heavy slash
description: A heavy slash that does moderate damage

name: Thunder slash
description: Coat your sword with lightning and slash your foes. Can inflict paralysis.

name: Fierce stab
description: A devastating stab that causes bleeding

name: Cutter
description: Unleash a slash that cuts through  enemies. Causes bleeding.

name: Fireball
description: Shoot a fire ball to burn your foes

name: Slow
description: Reduces the speed of one target

name: Lightning strike
description: Summon lightning to electrify your foes. Can inflic paralysis.

name: Disintegration
description: A powerful magic orb that disintegrates foes. Can inflict burns.

name: Piercing Arrow
description: Unleash a powerful arrow that pierces armor. Causes bleeding.

name: Double shot
description: Shoot three targets at one time

name: Poison arrow
description: Shoot an arrow that poisons foes
